last_episode_to_air.name: The Camp Lakebottom Classic
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the last week of summer and the kids' volunteer as staff-in-training to help with the unexpected arrival of two new campers until Buttsquat takes over the camp, and the gang challenges Buttsquat to the Lakebottom Classic for true ownership of Lakebottom one last time. This is the series finale.

episodes.name: Escape From Camp Lakebottom
episodes.overview: McGee, Gretchen and Squirt arrive at Camp Lakebottom to find themselves held captive by a hungry zombie, a raging Sasquatch and a ruthless chef.

episodes.name: Rise of the Bottom Dwellers
episodes.overview: McGee and Buttsquat compete to see whose camp is best, but a race up Mt. Fittoblow triggers a volcano that could wipe out Lakebottom and Sunny Smiles, so its up to Gretchen to save the day.

episodes.name: Afternoon of the Living Gitch
episodes.overview: Squirt's underwear is washed in toxic cleanser.

episodes.name: Mindsuckers From the Depths
episodes.overview: An evil leech attached itself to Squirt.

episodes.name: Jaws of Old Toothy
episodes.overview: The beach is closed because of a giant, raging fish.

episodes.name: Arachnattack
episodes.overview: Squirt brings home a baby monster spider.

episodes.name: Cluck of the Were-Chicken
episodes.overview: A hulking were-chicken stalks the camp.

episodes.name: Gnome Force
episodes.overview: Buttsquat captures one of Rosebud's garden gnomes.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: The Bottom Dwellers stage Armand's awful play.

episodes.name: Frankenfixer
episodes.overview: McGee and the kids decide to help Sawyer with his to-do list.

episodes.name: Cheeks of Dread
episodes.overview: Bottom Dwellers are trapped on Screech Island with a camper eating chipmunk.

episodes.name: Doo Doo Doomsday
episodes.overview: The biggest monster holiday of the year.

episodes.name: Marshmallow Madness
episodes.overview: The campers are threatened when Armand goes into a marshmallow frenzy. But they eat the marshmallow bushes and have mushroom lumps that when itch it will create more marshmallow bushes.

episodes.name: 28 Suzis Later
episodes.overview: McGee and the Bottom Dwellers are hopelessly outnumbered when Suzi moves to Camp Lakebottom along with her posse of 'mean girl' mud replicas.

episodes.name: Pranks for Nothing
episodes.overview: McGee releases a mischievous pixie.

episodes.name: Zombie Dearest
episodes.overview: Sawyer's brain-eating mother arrives in Camp Lakebottom, much to Sawyer's dismay.

episodes.name: Terror From the Toybox
episodes.overview: Buttsquat's teddy bear falls to the bottom of Lake Icky Gloomy and is exposed to radiation, giving it brainwashing abilities, and only penny can fix this stuffed mess!.

episodes.name: Slimeball Run
episodes.overview: Eager to win Buttsquat's awesome new racer, McGee challenges him to a cross-Lakebottom race with the cars and Camp Lakebottom at stake.

episodes.name: Bite of the Buttsquat
episodes.overview: When Buttsquat suddenly becomes cool, McGee is immediately suspicious.

episodes.name: Sword of Ittibiticus
episodes.overview: The gang finds a frozen Minotaur.

episodes.name: It's a Headless Horse, Man
episodes.overview: McGee is thrilled when he wins a mounted horse head, until the horse head's evil body starts stealing the Bottom Dwellers noggins in a rodeo rampage.

episodes.name: Voyage to the Bottom of the Deep
episodes.overview: McGee, Squirt and Gretchen go into an old submarine and find themselves in an underground version of Camp Lakebottom.

episodes.name: Pirates of Ickygloomy
episodes.overview: While playing Pirates on a shipwreck the Bottom Dwellers must battle the ghost Spitbeard the Pirate, who is determined to win back his ship.

episodes.name: Attack of the 50-Foot Squirt
episodes.overview: After eating a rare plant, Squirt grows into a hulking giant-and a target for Buttsquat, who wishes to use Squirt's massive size to his advantage.

episodes.name: Bloody Marty
episodes.overview: McGee, Squirt, and Gretchen release Bloody Marty from the Mirror World.

episodes.name: Ghost in the Mower
episodes.overview: The Bottom Dwellers summon a ghostly Groundskeeper to help take care of their overgrown soccer field.

episodes.name: Trouble in Spit Creek
episodes.overview: During a game of frisbee, McGee and Buttsquat get lost in the forest for what feels like days and must work together to survive the terrors of the forest and make it back to camp safely.

episodes.name: The Spy Who Squatched Me
episodes.overview: The Bottom Dwellers discover that Armand was once a secret agent when they visit his old hideaway at the top of a mountain. His old nemesis comes back to face him one last time in a battle of wits and dance moves.

episodes.name: Ants in Our Camp
episodes.overview: When McGee mistakenly concocts a spray that shrinks the campers to ant size, they meet a friendly blue ant who agrees to help them navigate their way through this now dangerously giant world and return to normal.

episodes.name: Fanboy Freakout
episodes.overview: McGee is desperate to win a hovercraft and enters a photo of Armand into a Sasquatch photo contest, but soon the gang must save Armand from a crazy Sasquatch-napper.

episodes.name: Are You My Mummy?
episodes.overview: The Campers and Buttsquat come across an ancient pyramid inhabited by mummies! The kids are soon sent running for their mommies when Gretchen is mistaken for the missing Queen.

episodes.name: Slimey Come Home
episodes.overview: Something big is lurking in Lake Ickygloomy and causing trouble for Buttssquat. Quick to blame the problems on Slimey, McGee and the gang must prove Slimey's innocence.

episodes.name: McGee the Mermaid
episodes.overview: The kids accidentally resurrect an evil mermaid who floods the camp in her first step toward world domination.

episodes.name: Welcome to Buttcon
episodes.overview: When McGee, Gretchen and Squirt sneak into Buttsquat's Sunny Smilers comic-con, it's not long before they start acting out scenes from their favorite sci-fi show.

episodes.name: High Plains Garbage Eater
episodes.overview: It's Western Week at camp and the gang finds themselves in the middle of a good ol’ fashioned show down with mutant raccoons, over garbage.

episodes.name: Dream a Little Scream
episodes.overview: The Monsters tuck the Campers into bed and warn them of the devious mosquito Dream Weevil. Taking the myth to heart McGee finds himself in a wild dream where he learns to overcome his fears and protect his friends from the Dream Weevil.

episodes.name: The Superfantastic Mega-Buds
episodes.overview: After touching a glowing orb from outer space, McGee, Gretchen, and Squirt get special powers.

episodes.name: It Came From My Nose
episodes.overview: After a sneezing fit, McGee is hunted by a giant booger that wants to return home to his nose.

episodes.name: McGee. T.
episodes.overview: McGee befriends a frog-like alien creature that crash lands near Camp Lakebottom.

episodes.name: The Great Tiki Hunt
episodes.overview: McGee and his friends find an old Tiki idol and accidentally unleash an ancient Tiki deity. Although the deity initially seems nice, he soon gives the campers the "honor" of being his prey in the Great Tiki Hunt.

episodes.name: Camp Plantbottom
episodes.overview: It's Suzi's birthday and McGee ate her gift. Desperate to find her another gift, McGee grows a mutant plant using Rosebuds special fertilizer.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: When the kids play a video game they are transported into the game. But when Buttsquat plays the game he is turned into the boss and makes some of the camp disappear so the kids need to stop him and return camp to normal.

episodes.name: Clockwork Slime
episodes.overview: The campers find a time-travelling clock and take a trip through Camp Lakebottom's past and future. They save the camp from Buttsquat, who turns a slime geyser into a goldmine!

episodes.name: Ride the Haunted Howler
episodes.overview: McGee worries that camp has raised his fear tolerance too high.

episodes.name: Buttastic Journey
episodes.overview: McGee shrinks to the size of an atom. When Buttsquat drinks him in a smoothie McGee ends up controlling his brain.

episodes.name: Monkey See, Monkey Kung Fu
episodes.overview: Gretchen seeks help from Rosebud when she loses her Kung Fu Chi and ends up fighting the legendary Dark Monkey Kung Fu Master.

episodes.name: Red Drawn
episodes.overview: A traveling salesman visits the camp one rainy day and sells McGee a magic pencil. When his drawings start to come to life and overrun the camp McGee must erase his monster mistake.

episodes.name: Pandora's Jock
episodes.overview: In the hope of beating his rivals at the first-ever Ickygloomy Slopstical Course Race, McGee summons a trainer to help him shape up.

episodes.name: Ring Around the Gretchen
episodes.overview: Gretchen lets McGee give her a makeover.

episodes.name: Chilli Con Carnage
episodes.overview: McGee grows tired of Rosebud's cooking.

episodes.name: Valley of the Iguanasquat
episodes.overview: The Bottom Dwellers search for a lost crystal.

episodes.name: The Legend of Wiggly's Gold
episodes.overview: The Bottom Dwellers venture into a cavern during a treasure hunt.

episodes.name: Adventures in Bottomland
episodes.overview: During an unfair polo match, McGee falls into an armadillo hole and finds himself in Bottomland.

episodes.name: Golem My Way
episodes.overview: While doing arts and crafts, McGee builds a magical clay Golem who follows his commands.

episodes.name: S.P.U.D.S
episodes.overview: McGee, Gretchen and Squirt argue with Suzi and Buttsquat over a potato patch, disturbing the potato king;

episodes.name: Monster Hunters R Us
episodes.overview: McGee finds out something about Rosebud

episodes.name: Golfadoom
episodes.overview: McGee, Gretchen, and Buttsquat each sink a hole in one at the same time

episodes.name: There Is Something About Mamba
episodes.overview: Sawyer attracts former student Anna Mamba, who is a gigantic snake.

episodes.name: Eclipsalypso
episodes.overview: McGee summons the Moon Dervish, who will bring the apocalypse unless a Sasquatch dances for him

episodes.name: Apocalypse Squirt
episodes.overview: McGee and Squirt have a fight

episodes.name: Itchy Witchy Pizza Project
episodes.overview: Gretchen, McGee, and Squirt are trapped by a witch who forces campers into pizza slave labor

episodes.name: Breakout From Buttvault B
episodes.overview: Suzi gives Buttsquat a rare action figure that was meant for McGee.

episodes.name: Scare-a-Normal Activity
episodes.overview: The host of "Paranormal Confronter comes to Camp Lakebottom and McGee vows to protect Lakebottom's supernatural secrets

episodes.name: Beast Feast
episodes.overview: The campers befriend an elderly former Lakebottom camper, Poe.

episodes.name: Big Top Terror
episodes.overview: The campers summon Armand's old rival, Doofus the clown, who vows to destroy the campers.

episodes.name: Slimal Fear
episodes.overview: McGee prepares what he thinks is the best prank ever.

episodes.name: Who's Ghouling Who
episodes.overview: During a game of who's the best scarier, Gretchen befriends a ghost called Preston, but he gets a crush on her.

episodes.name: The Abominable Dr. Squatch
episodes.overview: Armand wants to make a film, the incredibly creepy Dr. Bigfoot! however while making it, a monster egg hatches, but he and McGee think the monster is a special effect.

episodes.name: Schwampbillies
episodes.overview: McGee and Gretchen find themselves on opposite sides of a long-running feud when they and Squirt become lost in a swamp.

episodes.name: Remember Fort Sunnybottom
episodes.overview: A capture-the-flag game turns deadly when the ghost of Gen. Butt appears in the form of Buttsquat.

episodes.name: Seven Foot Itch
episodes.overview: Squirt resurrects his pet lousy from the grave.

episodes.name: Being McGee
episodes.overview: A broken amulet causes McGee and Buttsquat to switch bodies.

episodes.name: Messie Bessie
episodes.overview: The campers build a race car to help Sawyer relive his racing days

episodes.name: Nanny Num Nums
episodes.overview: Nanny Num Nums comes to Lakebottom to care for an ill Rosebud.

episodes.name: Pod Parents
episodes.overview: Suzi and McGee must work together to save their parents from thirsty pod plants.

episodes.name: Zombie Scouts
episodes.overview: The campers train to be Sawyer's Zombie Scouts.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: McGee, Gretchen, Squirt, and Sawyer discover a creepy cabin inhabited by a strange caretaker

episodes.name: It's a Horrible Life
episodes.overview: McGee experiences what Lakebottom would be like if he never existed.

episodes.name: Bird Brains
episodes.overview: The Campers go to an island which is a bird-watchers' paradise and try to find a rare bird that will repeat what they say.

episodes.name: The Real Vincent
episodes.overview: Everyone is painting their own masterpieces, and a zombie artist possesses one of the painters.

episodes.name: McCrossroads
episodes.overview: McGee wants to be a rock star but it comes at a price when rock goddess Sheba Bandshee tries to take him on tour as her support act - forever

episodes.name: Lucky Duck
episodes.overview: McGee has his lucky duck stolen from him by Jordan.

episodes.name: When Suzis Attack
episodes.overview: Suzi gets jealous of McGee

episodes.name: How to Potty Train Your Dragon
episodes.overview: McGee tries to take care of a baby dragon.

episodes.name: Hiccups
episodes.overview: McGee gets a bad case of the Hiccups, that make stuff disappear!

episodes.name: Boogeyman Fever
episodes.overview: The kids have to face Squirt's greatest fear, The Boogeyman!

episodes.name: Fright Club
episodes.overview: The campers tell stories to pass the time.

episodes.name: Bottom Dome
episodes.overview: McStanger inhabits a post-apocalyptic world.

episodes.name: The Day Squirt Stood Still
episodes.overview: The campers track down a UFO inhabited by an alien from the planet Squont.

episodes.name: Anti Gravity
episodes.overview: McGee and Buttsquat argue over who's a better space captain.

episodes.name: Slaybells
episodes.overview: On the eve of Eekmas, McGee blames his toot on Squirt.

episodes.name: Smells Like The Holidays
episodes.overview: McGee is visited by three ghosts looking to save Camp Lakebottom from catastrophe before it's too late.

episodes.name: Last Days
episodes.overview: McGee tries to save the camp from being overtaken by Grim Camper.

episodes.name: Knock On Wood
episodes.overview: The Bottom Dwellers come across a suitcase in the attic that contains a ventriloquist dummy. They soon realise this dummy has the power to turn living things into wood - including Squirt!

episodes.name: Duh’Rehka
episodes.overview: While chasing his gopher-nemesis, Sawyer gets zapped into his brain bin and emerges super smart!

episodes.name: Chore Leave
episodes.overview: Rosebud leaves the group to do the chores.

episodes.name: Ice Queen
episodes.overview: Suzi gets hit on the head and becomes an evil Ice Queen.

episodes.name: Live And Let Squatch
episodes.overview: The campers convince Armand to protect his old spy nemesis Abomina Lafur, but when she threatens the camp with a volatile brownie explosive -it's up to Armand to get his spy on!

episodes.name: Tooth Troll
episodes.overview: Squirt is captured by a Tooth Troll who claims his baby tooth has enough power to summon all the teeth in the world. Now McGee has to snatch the baby tooth before everyone is left toothless.

episodes.name: Hive and Seek
episodes.overview: Gretchen turns into a bee person.

episodes.name: Slugfight at Bottom Gulch
episodes.overview: Grandpappy Blackbutt tries to steal the deed to the town.

episodes.name: I, Zomborg
episodes.overview: Sawyer turns into a Zomborg.

episodes.name: Head Two Head
episodes.overview: Suzi and Gretchen accidentally get fused together.

episodes.name: The Last of the Wild
episodes.overview: McGee quickly discovers that Lakebottom isn't a typical camp.

episodes.name: Sweat, Hot Lakebottom Summer
episodes.overview: McGee uses anti-sweat cream, but it backfires and makes him sweat even more.

episodes.name: The S'mogre
episodes.overview: McGee becomes a s'mores monster.

episodes.name: Camp Lockdownbottom
episodes.overview: Rosebud takes charge of the camp and puts it on lockdown after her golden ladle goes missing.

episodes.name: All You Need Is Larva
episodes.overview: Squirt gets a case of the worms.

episodes.name: Meet the Gretch's Parents
episodes.overview: Gretch's parents visit the camp, but get scared of the monsters.

episodes.name: Now With 100% More Portal
episodes.overview: A portal is discovered that takes the kids to a similar camp.

episodes.name: Lakebo-Tron
episodes.overview: Buttsquat and McGee get digitized into a classic 80's video game and take on the game's software guardian to escape.

episodes.name: Rise of the Dawn of the Beginning of the Planet of Armand!
episodes.overview: The bottomdwellers travel through the interdimensional portal to an all-Sasquatch version of Camp Lakebottom.

episodes.name: McGee's First Flush
episodes.overview: Mutant apes surface that were former pets of McGee and Suzi and seek revenge after being flushed.

episodes.name: House of Ear Wax
episodes.overview: Squirt's ear wax comes to life and hypnotizes Squirt into replacing his friends with sculpted ear wax replicas.

episodes.name: Butt-Squad
episodes.overview: Buttsquat brianwashes the kids to become his warriors.

episodes.name: You Sank My Battle-Squirt!
episodes.overview: An alien ship invades the camp.

episodes.name: I, Rodent
episodes.overview: The gang becomes squirrels to answer for their crimes against the squirrel community.

episodes.name: Undies Cover of the Night
episodes.overview: McGee has a nightmare come true and the kids try to intervene.

episodes.name: Afterlife of the Party
episodes.overview: The kids stop partying due to the Party Animal.

episodes.name: F.L.O.P.P.Y the Elephant
episodes.overview: The kids befriend a lost circus elephant.

episodes.name: Tur-Keepin it Real
episodes.overview: The kids get trapped in a different dimension populated by giant Turkeysaurus Rexes.

episodes.name: Little Saint Nicky
episodes.overview: Santa Claus crash lands in the camp and McGee tries to help get him out.

episodes.name: Nostril-Damus!
episodes.overview: McGee catches a cold, which gives him the ability to tell fortunes.

episodes.name: Working Over-Slime
episodes.overview: The kids discover that Slimey is secretly hanging out with the bottomlukers.

episodes.name: The Old Man and the McGee
episodes.overview: An older McGee travels back in time to change the past and stop the staff from becoming bloodthirsty monsters.

episodes.name: Operation: McMom
episodes.overview: The gang visits McGee's town to find out what happened to his parents.

episodes.name: The Lakebottom House of Horrors! Mwa Ha, Ha!
episodes.overview: The kids enter a Lakebottom House of Horrors only to discover that they will soon be the house's star attractions, and they fight their way through the Lakebottom House of Horrors to a final showdown with Gluteus Crouch.

episodes.name: The Camp Lakebottom Classic
episodes.overview: It's the last week of summer and the kids' volunteer as staff-in-training to help with the unexpected arrival of two new campers until Buttsquat takes over the camp, and the gang challenges Buttsquat to the Lakebottom Classic for true ownership of Lakebottom one last time. This is the series finale.
